product: Mobile Processor and Wearable Processor Exynos
shortDescription: An issue was discovered in the m2m scaler driver in Samsung Mobile Processor and Wearable Processor Exynos 9820, 9825, 980, 990, 850,and W920. A Use-After-Free in the mobile processor leads to privilege escalation.
vulnerabilityName: Samsung Mobile Processor and Wearable Processor Exynos m2m Scaler Driver Vulnerability
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
